Hi Mike,

As Ken points out, we have done some looking into simplification (i.e.
deleting or disabling topological features), and so has Colin.

We presented a late-breaking paper at GECCO on the subject, and it's
actually in the files section of our group here:

http://groups.yahoo.com/group/neat/files/

It's called: james_gecco04.pdf 

Have a look if you're interested.

Derek
